author: Cline
title: WebSocket Protocol Documentation
description: Created comprehensive documentation of the WebSocket protocol used for communication with the WhisperLive server

changes.title: WebSocket protocol documentation
changes.description: Created comprehensive documentation of the WebSocket protocol
details: Documented connection states and state transitions
Described message formats for client-to-server and server-to-client communication
Documented connection flow and reconnection strategy
Listed known issues and next steps for protocol improvement

next_steps: Update the WebSocket message format documentation to include the new protocol details
Test the improved connection state tracking system
Address the multiple parallel connections issue
